      • convert

        protected void convert(BaseViewHolder helper,
                       MultiItemEntity item)
        从类复制的说明: BaseQuickAdapter
        Implement this method and use the helper to adapt the view to the given item.
        指定者:
        convert 在类中 BaseQuickAdapter<MultiItemEntity,BaseViewHolder>
        参数:
        helper - A fully initialized helper.
        item - The item that needs to be displayed.
